name: pump production, 40W | pump, 40W | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4542/documentation

Water pump Grundfos UP 15-35x20 with a capacity of 40W for use in solar collector systems.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Production and disposal of a water pump. Including materials. Not including energy use of production and infrastructure for factory.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2812:Manufacture of fluid power equipment

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of weighting the different parts of the pump.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Circulating pump for heat exchange fluid in solar collector systems for a one family dwelling.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: None This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Own weighting of the different parts of  the pump.
